user.title: Set up Heating Oil Monitor
user.description: Configure your heating oil tank monitoring

data_description.air_gap_sensor: Select the sensor that measures the air gap from the top of the tank
data_description.tank_diameter_cm: The diameter of your cylindrical tank in centimeters
data_description.tank_length_cm: The length of your cylindrical tank in centimeters
data_description.refill_threshold_liters: Minimum volume increase (in liters) to automatically detect a refill
data_description.noise_threshold_cm: Ignore volume changes smaller than this (filters temperature fluctuations)
data_description.consumption_calculation_days: Number of days to average for consumption and 'days until empty' calculations
data_description.temperature_sensor: Temperature sensor for thermal expansion compensation (recommended for outdoor tanks)
data_description.refill_stabilization_minutes: Wait time after refill detection for readings to stabilize (filters erratic readings during delivery)
data_description.refill_stability_threshold_liters: Maximum volume variance in recent readings to consider stable
data_description.reading_buffer_size: Number of readings to use for median filtering (higher = more smoothing)
data_description.reading_debounce_seconds: Minimum time between processing readings (filters rapid successive readings)

error.sensor_not_found: The selected sensor does not exist
